title._content: Tapiau, East Prussia, wrecked by Russians  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Tapiau, East Prussia, wrecked by Russians [between ca. 1914 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows buildings damaged in Tapiau, East Prussia (now Gvardeysk, Russia) during World War I. Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: World War, 1914-1918. Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18785 Call Number: LC-B2- 3428-13
